content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: fire_charge
inventory=[{"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 36, "index": 11}, {"type": "brick_stairs", "quantity": 48, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 46, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 51, "index": 23}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 28, "index": 26}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 50, "index": 35}, {"type": "blue_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 36}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 30, "index": 38}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 52, "index": 39}, {"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 62, "index": 41}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a fire_charge, I need to first craft a blaze_powder. To craft a blaze_powder, I need to place a blaze_rod in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the blaze_rod from slot 42 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 14 with quantity 2
